resources.string: This will open a webpage to log into AniList.co. Afterwards, share or open the page in this app.
This method prevents malicious redirects. By having you share/open this app explicitly (or copy-pasting), it avoids anyone else intercepting the token.
Or paste in an auth token
Do you want to save changes?
